name: X-Slap Early Access
summary:
X-Slap: Defend Your Candy with Your Bare Hands!

Monsters are invading your home, and they're after your candy stash! X-Slap transforms your living room into an arcade battleground where your hands become the ultimate weapons.

Pure Gesture-Powered Action

Slap balls at monster invaders! Punch red orbs to unleash explosive bomb clusters, and point-and-poke yellow orbs to shoot devastating finger lasers. The hand tracking makes every gesture feel natural and satisfying, though you can also play with...
